Title: Relates to the dispensing of glucagon
Summary: Relates to the dispensing of glucagon; authorizes a pharmacist to dispense any Food and Drug Administration approved glucagon medication to an insulin using person regardless if the person currently has or previously has had a prescription for glucagon.
LawCode: Add ยง279-a, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to the dispensing of glucagon
